Traits.Name: Phasing
Traits.Description: Can ignore obstruction and pass through, but not end your turn in, terrain or characters.

Traits.Name: Skirmisher
Traits.Description: Can move diagonally and dash action is full speed.

Traits.Name: Barely There
Traits.Description: Spriggs are intangible and don't cause engagement. Characters can't collide with them and can share their space. They disappear when combat ends, or all other non-sprigg allies have been defeated.

Actions.Name: Frolic
Actions.Description: The Sprigg swaps places with an ally in range 3, teleporting.

Actions.Name: Mischief
Actions.Description: The Sprigg swaps the places of two other characters in range 3 of each other and the Sprigg, teleporting both of them. If either cannot teleport, this move cannot be made.
